definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
Mountain of Flames of legend/fig. insurmountable obstacle/Mountain of Flames in Turpan depression in Xinjiang
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔裏燃燒着一團火焰，讓人想到奧林匹克聖火。

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .
sentences.chinese: 用火焰切割器在包裝上切開一個十字形切口。

sentences.english: Take me where my future's lyin', St. Elmo's Fire.
sentences.chinese: 永遠給我照亮未來，聖埃爾莫火焰。

sentences.english: A flame AAS method is employed for the determination of lead in a traditional patented medicinal preparation "Xinling Pill".
sentences.chinese: 採用火焰原子吸收光譜法測定中成藥心靈丸中的鉛。

sentences.english: Improved Fire Blast now is a Tier 2 Talent. Up from Tier 1.
sentences.chinese: 強化火焰衝擊由一階天賦升爲二階天賦。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the ridge itself seemed to burst into flames.
sentences.chinese: 突然，山脊自己也似乎迸射出火焰。

sentences.english: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life.
sentences.chinese: 火焰蘊含着渾沌與毀滅的鼓動，以及生命的種子。

sentences.english: He was watching the red flames in the wide open fireplace .
sentences.chinese: 他注視着敞着的寬大壁爐裏的熊熊火焰。

sentences.english: Other Russian churches also have flame-shaped domes.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯其它教堂也有這種火焰狀的圓屋頂。

sentences.english: Yet can not stop the fire of love from me to you.
sentences.chinese: 也澆不熄我對你愛情的火焰。

sentences.english: The flame rises as high as one thousand feet. The dragon jubilates and people celebrate vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 一行火焰高百丈，龍騰人歡氣勢雄。

sentences.english: Carbon nanotubes synthesis using diffusion flame is a kind of novel technique.
sentences.chinese: 利用擴散火焰合成碳納米管是一項新的技術和方法。

sentences.english: Passion sparks dream, Sport opens a new chapter of communication.
sentences.chinese: 激情點燃夢想火焰，運動抒寫東師華章。

sentences.english: Helo one burst into flames while the demolition team boarded the Chinook.
sentences.chinese: 1號機化爲了一團火焰的同時爆破組登上了支奴幹。

sentences.english: Oxyacetylene flame is the hottest one kwonn for ordinary use.
sentences.chinese: 氧炔焰是常規用途中最熱的火焰。

sentences.english: The flames licked at the burned and charred support beams of Steve's little home.
sentences.chinese: 火焰將斯蒂夫家小屋子上的橫樑燒焦了。
